name: kevhender.net (This site)
features: Several versions written with different frameworks/libraries (ExtJS, Angular, React, jQuery), to showcase different abilities
Sencha version written as universal app with ExtJS 6.0.1. Detects desktop/mobile users and redirects to best site
Angular version written with AngularJS, Twitter Bootstrap CSS, and jQuery
React version written with ReactJS, Twitter Bootstrap CSS, and jQuery
summary: Contact me to learn more, or check out the project on GitHub

name: Virtual Wisdom
overview: Front-end of enterprise application that provides insights into performance and availability of a network's infrastructure
features: UI written using ExtJS 6.5.3 (upgraded from 5.1.0, after upgrade from original development with 4.2.3)
Controller layer written with Java, using REST APIs to interact with front-end
Styled using a custom SASS theme designed by UX designed and implemented by me
Uses HighCharts for charting a graphs, and YFiles for network topology mapping

name: Tailgater Mobile
overview: Mobile application for Tailgater, an event-planning platform for sports fans to help plan tailgates, invite friends, find friends' tailgates, and follow the best tailgates from across the country
features: Written using Sencha Touch 2.2.1 and Apache Cordova 3.0
Built into native iOS and Android apps and published to App Store and Google Play
Styled using SASS
Uses native functionality for Camera and Geolocation
summary: This app has since been retired, but feel free to inquire for more info.

name: Jira2Go
overview: Mobile application for developers to use JIRA
features: Written using Sencha Touch 2.1 and PhoneGap
Built into native Android App with support for device functions like Back and Menu keys
Styled using SASS
Connects to JIRA sites directly from app using JIRA's REST API and Sencha Touch AJAX requests; cross-domain conflicts are avoided using PhoneGap permissions

name: OnTarget
overview: Full-service SaaS solution for Behavioral Health agencies
features: Written using ExtJS 4.2, Spring 3.2, Hibernate 4.1, and Jasper
Architected front-end and back-end from scratch, using an existing database schema
Build process used Ant tasks to call Sencha Command for ExtJS optimization
Incorporates ExtJS 4 Charts for enhanced visual aides

name: Aurora (now called Equilibrium)
overview: All-in-One Operation Management Software for cabinet dealers and remodelers
features: Written using ExtJS 3.4, JBoss SEAM, Hibernate 3, FusionCharts, and Jasper

Converted an existing JSF/RichFaces application to ExtJS.  At first we converted only the grids, but quickly afterwards decided to rip out the entire existing interface and replace with a single, dynamic Javascript application
Build process used YUI compressor and Ant regex replacement to minimize Javascript/css and replace all script/link tags with single tags for minified code
